11198.quoteText: The minimum age to create a miHoYo user account is 13 (“Account”).
11198.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

11199.quoteText: In the event of a merger, acquisition, reorganization, bankruptcy or other similar event, we will make an announcement in advance, disclose the details of the event and information about the successor, and with the express consent of you or your guardian again, your personal data may transfer to the successor of miHoYo.
11199.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

11200.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

11201.quoteText:
miHoYo may periodically modify, adjust or revise the terms of this Privacy Policy.
The updated terms will be announced to you and obtain your consent again.
11201.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

11203.quoteText: If major clause changes are involved, we will make an announcement in advance.
11203.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance

tosdr.case: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance

11205.quoteText:
Data We Collect and Process

i. . Contact data (such as email address or telephone number, if necessary)

ii. . Account registration or registration for on-line game participation (such as user name, password, miHoYo ID）

iii. . Information in miHoYo community forums, chats, or when you provide feedback or other user generated content (such as information that you post, comment or follow in any of our content or services. information sent through chat.
11205.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
